history.content: Hi this was my exact schedule last year!! It actually was pretty doable. A lot of times, there would end up being work to do in all 3 at the same exact time, but as long as you start each assignment early you should actually be fine. IMO, 61c was the most time consuming of all (labs and hws every week) but I did take it with Weaver who has more projects than Garcia so that could be it too. 100 took the backseat most of the time which is the only downside since I didn’t end up focusing on it a lot but still ended up doing well (A-). 170 has a consistent workload (weekly hw) so that made it easy to create a routine with the 3 classes since I had a dedicated few times a week to 170 problem sets. They can be heavy though, so of course start those right away!

Hi! I'm contemplating on whether or not I should take these three classes together in the fall and I was wondering if anyone else has taken Data 100 + CS 61C + CS 170 together. I've taken all the prerequisites for these courses and felt pretty comfortable with them. If I do end up dropping one, I think it'll be CS 61C because that's the class I'm least interested in out of the three. Any thoughts? Thanks in advance!
history.subject: Courseload of Data 100 + CS 170 + CS 61C
